name: LEWD GIRLS: Hentai Puzzle
description:
The Best Hentai Puzzle Game You'll Ever Find on Steam!

Experience a classic swap-puzzle game with incredible art!

Stunning ladies and soothing music will help you unwind and find happiness after a long workday.

Features:

  • Exceptional art!
  • Beautiful ladies!
  • Relaxing music!
  • Stunning performance!
  • Lots of happy times!
